NOTE FOR MAINTAINTERS: This is the central authority for controlling the right own instances to use.

Require Export bedrock.lang.si_logic.bi.
<- exporting siProp
Require Export iris.base_logic.lib.own. (* <- exporting inG and gFunctors *)
